entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:56 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
